text: “Ndithudi ine ndidzawasocheretsa ndipo, ndithudi, ndidzaukitsa zilakolako zawo zopanda pake ndipo, ndithudi, ndidzawalamula kuboola makutu a ng’ombe ndipo, ndithudi, ndidzawalamula kusintha zinthu zimene zinalengedwa ndi Mulungu.” Ndithudi aliyense amene asankha Satana m’malo mwa Mulungu ngati mtetezi wake, iye ndi wotayika kodziwikiratu
